body.p: Native of Virginia. Worked as a lawyer in Mercer County. Owned two slaves in 1860.

Spouses: Nancy Hooe, Susan Hooe (Burford)
Children: Joseph A Hooe, Jennie Hooe, Edmund B Hooe, Robert M Hooe, William A Hooe, Emmet M Hooe, Frank Hooe, Nannie Hooe, Willie Hooe
